column1: In 2019, during a very different time  in our history , the Federal Reserve began a year of listening sessions with the public, tied to changes being considered  in our approach to monetary policy , which was:  how the Federal Open Market Committee uses interest rate s and other tools to promote a  healthy economy.
Lately, as you know, the Fed has been focused on lowering inflation, which is essential if we want to support a  growing economy and rising incomes.
We want to hear how inflation , along with the higher interest  rates needed to bring inflation down,  is affecting you and your communities .
